name: Matt's Plants
description:
This is a team project made for the  Cultivation Jam.

The concept for the game is something along the lines of you the player going over to your friend/relatives house to make sure that their plants are well taken care of. Neither of us really had a lot of time to spend on the project, but it was a fun challenge to tackle nonetheless!

We didn't have time to finish, so there is still placeholder art in the game and mechanics that we wanted to see in the game never got realized due to time constraints. As such, there is not a tutorial either so here is a quick guide:

Inspect the plants to see if they are rootbound, make sure they have water and just soak in the wonderful music.
